group_1.textLeft: This baking stuff is being really mean to us…

group_1.textRight: Good grief...

group_1.textLeft: The words on the recipe don’t make any@sense to me.
They just write the name of the thing to use,@but I can’t tell which one they mean.

group_1.textRight: …It only took you ten minutes to give up…
Well, thankfully, giving up early means@there’s still time to recover.
It’s a lot better than having nothing to show@for right before the deadline...
I figured this might happen, so while you@two were being noisy in the kitchen,
I was selecting all of the cookware you'll need.
It helped that I have every single thing within@this house memorized.
And on internet recipes, there are sometimes@parts that will lack proper explanation.
So I've just finished summarizing everything@in my notes.

group_1.textLeft: You went so far for us…

group_1.textRight: That’s all the kindness you’ll get from me.@I won’t go easy on you from now on.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much!@Please, let's work together!

group_1.narration: ―Nayuta―@Does this strawberry…go like this?
―Rabi―@You’re doing it wrong.
―Mikage―@This sponge is…there, like that!
―Rabi―@It’s a bit off.
―Nayuta―@This is…probably fine…!
―Rabi―@What are you saying “probably” for? It’s wrong!
―Nayuta―@Umm, Rabi… I believe I’m the type@that improves from positive reinforcement…
―Mikage―@Mii too…
―Rabi―@Please stop acting spoiled.
―Nayuta―@I'm sorry...
―Rabi―@…No, don't be. I was being too harsh there.
―Mikage―@How's the cream look here, Rabitan?
―Rabi―@You did very well for how challenging it is.@However, once it’s time to cut…
―Nayuta―@Oh, you praised her before pointing out a flaw...
―Nayuta―@I see that you’re changing course on your guiding methods.
―Nayuta―@I’m sure it’ll make finishing this much more fun.
―Nayuta―@Oh…? I think I arranged the strawberries quite nicely here.
―Rabi―@Indeed, the arrangement on this single@spot looks well balanced, it’s pretty.
―Rabi―@Whoever gets this part will be very lucky.
―Nayuta―@I-it’s not like it’s some fluke,@I just have to make the rest of them just as pretty…!

group_1.textRight: I-I’m going for it…!
I just have to put…the last strawberry on@top, and…
Well done, you two.

group_1.textLeft: It's all thanks to you, Rabitan!
You watched over us all the way through.

group_1.textRight: As your servant, that’s simply my job.
It’s a little past noon now.
If you start handing them out now, you’ll still@be done by mid-afternoon as planned.
Let’s go, Nayutan!
I’ll have to refuse, as there is still house@cleaning to be done.

group_1.textLeft: Very well. Then, as we hand out these treats,
I’ll make sure to mention that they’re a@gift from you as well.

group_1.textRight: …There’s no need to be that considerate@of me. Now, you should get going.
Oh, yeah, didn't the Befana put the@treats inside socks?
Nayutan, do you have any socks to spare?

group_1.textLeft: We’ll just put them inside regular@paper bags.

group_1.textRight: Okay, let’s give a piece of happiness@to everyone!
